title: Sawtooth Signal Generator
name: LGF_SawToothCI
description: This function generates a sawtooth-shaped signal profile. For this it uses the time interval of the calling Cyclic Interrupt OB.

output.name: value
output.description: Current value of the sawtooth signal.

output.name: status
output.description: 16#0000-16#7FFF: Status of the FB 16#8000-16#FFFF: Error identification

output.name: subFunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

description_zh:
下面是给定任务的需求描述：
锯齿波信号发生器
--------------------------------
名称: LGF_SawToothCI
类型: FUNCTION_BLOCK
描述: 该函数生成一个锯齿波形的信号。为此，它使用了调用周期性中断OB的时间间隔。
输入:
- amplitude (Real): 1.0
- offset (Real): 0.0
- periode (UDInt): 1000
- phaseShift (Real): 0.0
- callOB (OB_CYCLIC): 
- reset (Bool): FALSE

输出:
- value (Real): 锯齿波信号的当前值。
- error (Bool): FALSE: 无错误
- status (Word): 16#0000-16#7FFF: FB的状态 16#8000-16#FFFF: 错误识别
- subFunctionStatus (Word): 被调用FB、FC和系统块的状
